Description: On I-95 at mile marker 136.1 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south center lane and right lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-664 at mile marker 2.1 in the City of Hampton, near Power Plant Parkway, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north left shoulder, left lane, and center lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 1.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
